title: [1.7.10][ssp/smp]Random TNT Mod-随机TNT爆炸模组！熊孩子有福了！
author: 740s
txt_content:
{:10_492:}废话不多说，直接介绍mod：
引用一下籽岷大大的视频：
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XOTQyMjcwNjc2.html

这是一个很熊的mod






先上作者原话：



Description:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]
This mod adds in a new type of TNT called Random TNT. Now you might be wondering, "What is Random TNT?" Well I won't tell you here, but there is a description for each new item in the mod below, but it also adds in 3 new items and 2 blocks into Minecraft. This may not seem a lot, but look below because some of these items are really interesting. Also this is my first mod so I will add a lot more to this mod in the future.
Content:

Sharp Stick:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

This is the first weapon I created, it's just a stick with some flint on it that does +3 attack damage and that's it, nothing special about this item.
Crafting Recipe:

Bedsidian:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

This is Bedsidian, it is twice the strength of normal obsidian and twice as long to mine it. It does not spawn naturally and requires you to craft it using normal Obsidian.
Crafting Recipe:

Mysterious Wall Chicken:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

This food item has a 20% chance of dropping out of stone when mined and it restores 4 bars of hunger, also it's delicious!
Random TNT:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

And now it's time for the Random TNT! It may look like a normal block of TNT, but it in reality it's an unpredictable explosive that can create an explosion that has a 0 block radius, to an explosion with a 1000 block radius. It can be extremely unpredictable and the explosion size can vary.
Crafting Recipe:

Random Grenade:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

Now if you thought Random TNT is bad, here comes the grenade version of it! It is just like Random TNT, except you throw it and the maximum explosion size is 250, one Random TNT can create 4 Random Grenades, also put 4 Random Grenades in a crafting table to get a block of Random TNT.
Crafting Recipe:



Rambo:[color=rgb(255, 255, 255) !important][url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]

Rambo is a new mob I added because I wanted to make my own mob and Rambo was the first thing I thought of. Anyways Rambo is a hostile mob that has 60 health, does 5 attack damage with no sword, can spawn with any sword or a bow and has armor like the Wither, but it's stronger and it also has a 10% chance of spawning in your world. So watch out for him, because he's pretty strong, plus, this is Rambo.
Stats:
Health: 60
Damage: 5
Weapons: Wooden Sword, Golden Sword, Iron Sword, Stone Sword, Diamond Sword and Bow
Defense: 15
Speed: 0.25D (slightly faster than a skeleton)
Skin Creator: ryangamer13 (yes, I am not good at making textures ok.)
Spawn Chance: 10%
Follow Range: 40 blocks
其实这个mod新增了几件物品，其中的一种TNT，改变了原版TNT的”模式“让TNT的爆炸范围变成随机的但点燃后会变得透明（这是个bug吧）
第2种植可投掷的TNT 手雷，爆炸范围也是随机的（视频有介绍）
官网的图貌似挂了，我的不知道是不是，
好了，记得回复，给金粒人气！！！
下载地址上面看！
